phrases: Oh, so this is the beach in this world!
it is tempting to just mow them all down at once, is not it, Miss Kobayashi?
The best thing about swimsuits is that you can boldly show off more flesh.
I-I do not where to look...
That does not make me happy to hear at all.
Well, that is to be expected.
Oh, that works for your swimsuits, too?
Yes, we looked them up on the internet!
I am more envious of what is filling out that swimsuit though.
Miss Kobayashi, what will you do?
What is the matter, Miss Kobayashi?
You have not been very excited all day.
To be honest, I am not a big fan of the beach.
Well, it is hot, you get sunburned, and sand is annoying.
Then why did you come with us today?
Because I do not have much else to do this summer.
My manager asked me to look after Shouta-kun, too,
so I figured going with everyone would be better.
Oh, I know what is going on here!
First, let us put on sunscreen!
having skin that gets damaged if you do not coat yourselves in such a thing.
Now, here I go, Miss Kobayashi!
Do anything weird and you are fired.
You really are a demon, are not you?
Why are you trying to seduce me?!
Miss Lucoa, why do not you just try being a demon?
Yes, yes, now just go straight.
You obliterated every last trace of it.
Do not go too far out.
That one time I was nearly killed really was a disaster.
I saw him from behind and mistook him for Rahab when calling out to him.
Well, no, it is because no one can help you if you start to drown.
Oh yeah, you humans cannot breathe under water, can you?
Swimming to my heart's content feels really good.
Does she have gills or something?
Lady Tohru, let us race to there.
Miss Kobayashi, please give us the signal!
Ah, I forgot to tell them to hold back.
Well, I guess it is time for lunch.
I just noticed that old man has not changed much since back then.
When I was still a kid, I came here with my family.
Could you tell me more about your family?
I think it was a normal family.
They had me go to college.
After that, I left home to work.
Every now and then I talk to my parents on the phone to tell them how I am doing.
Oh, I have not seen them in a while.
That is a normal human family?
Then why did Miss Kobayashi accept a dragon like me?
Why would someone born and raised normally...
the humans of this world could accept dragons?
It is been a while, so I am excited!
But I feel like seeing my parents after what we just talked about.
Every now and then I would like to see my parents.
I thought about introducing you to my parents.
Because I am sure they would kill you.
That sounds violent, but I guess that is common sense in your world, huh.
From my parent's point of view,
I am definitely the weird one, not common sense.
Talking to Tohru about things like this is kind of heavy.
It drives home the difference between understanding words
It makes me realize we have lived in vastly different worlds.
But maybe that is all the more reason I want to cherish this time we have together.
I think that means you have become independent.
You have developed your own unique set of values.
You mean I have become an adult?
Most people do not try to become adults, they just cannot stay children any longer.
Oh, you have hooked something, Miss Kobayashi.
I won them in a lottery at the shopping district.
A real dragon is way better than that!
I cannot understand anything you are saying.
So we are supposed to provide cover for Takiya here?
Apparently two of his sellers suddenly collapsed.
With my power, it will be easy to exterminate them all.
By the way, was leaving Kanna behind a good idea?
There is a lot here that cannot be shown to children.
I owe you quite a bit anyway.
You did not ask Mr. Fafnir?
Oh, he is participating as a circle.
A circle's a group of people like us, who sell things they made to other fans.
So why did Mr. Fafnir do that?
I recommended all kinds of anime and games to him,
and at some point he started drawing his own.
He is totally enjoying this world, is not he?
Well, Kobayashi-san, if you could handle sales,
and Tohru-chan, if you could manage the line please.
As of this moment, the third day of Comic Market has begun.
Everyone is just barely on the verge of running!
Something powerful is holding back their selfish impulses!
The new one and the previous one, please.
Water Dragon Shrine WA-91 End of Line
The end of the line for Water Dragon Shrine starts here!
I am sorry, please group closer together.
Hmm, for tens of thousands of individuals to be able take such
unified action without any prior exercises or training...
Something powerful must be influencing them.
I thought you were a cosplayer from abroad.
No, I am the real thing!
If you do not mind, could I please take your picture later?
I told you, I am real!
The end of line starts here!
It feels like I am in a fire drake's stomach.
I cannot believe it is this bad.
Comiket is not to be underestimated.
what in the world could be attracting this many people and keeping them all in check?
I have been waiting for this!
Summer Homework, Science Please select one of the following.
1) Sunflower Observation 2) Bug Collecting 3) Daily Weather 4) Electric Circuits Sunflower Observation: Observe the growth of a sunflower every day!
Bug Collecting: Catch bugs near convenience stores, parks, or nearby plazas!
Paste the bugs you have gathered!
Let us Stick the Bugs We Found Here!
Uh, I think it is around this area...
I figured I would stop by since I am on my break.
You are the one who looks dead, Mr. Fafnir.
Well, that is what it is like for first-timers.
Can I have a look at your book?
You have printed real, effective curses!
You could curse someone to death if you read this!
Wait, it is way too dangerous to be selling that to others!
Still, there are a lot of cosplayers here.
There are a lot of humans dressed up like the races from my world.
They are having fun pretending to be characters from anime and manga.
You are practically the same, too, Tohru.
No matter how you look at me, I am your loyal sex slave!
The sahuagin, goblin, and witch over there...
Oh, I wonder what they are from.
You are from the other world, right?
What are you doing here today?
I came to spread my wings.
I normally live disguised as a human,
but coming to events like this let us me enjoy time in my real form.
Why not take the chance to enjoy your real form, too?
The one that could eat us all?!
Dragons must be doing some crazy things.
When dragons get hungry, we only eat as much as necessary...
And in the end, this world is the survival of the fittest, so...
You are not denying it, just giving supplementary explanation?
Did you not read the participant guide?!
I guess Miss Lucoa came, too.
Now that I look closer, there is a lot more.
Beings in their original form, that is.
Those with great presence have left records of their stays in this world on different levels,
like Mr. Fafnir and Miss Lucoa.
I would like to return to my real form...
As long as you keep it where it will not because trouble, you can.
Oh, can I take your picture?
Excuse me, can I take one, too?
Excuse me, can I get your eyes over here please?
Well, to be honest, it is pretty rough.
But I can hang in there.
Um, it seems like everyone here is being drawn to this place by something powerful.
Do you have any idea what that is?
I think it is something that only exists in this place in this moment right now.
And I think everyone loves that.
Could you take your picture soon?
Geh, there is another line forming?
As of now, Comic Market 90 is over.
We will see you again in winter!
We managed fine without you during the second half.
I am sorry for ditching you.
Oh, Mr. Fafnir, how did it go?
What did you think of your first Comiket?
I reconfirmed my love for you, Miss Kobayashi.
You were a huge help today!
And I would like to ask for your help as staff again this winter!
What will we print for our next thin book?
How about a dragon maid girl?
What should I do for it?
Well, I think you should study something that you find
mysterious or would like to know more about.
Kobayashi-san, there is a lot of talk about Tohru-chan on the internet.
They said there was a sales lady with dead-fish eyes.
And they got turned on by those eyes.
